alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN CITRUS...CENTRAL SUMTER...PASCO...HERNANDO...PINELLAS AND WESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EST... At 414 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Homosassa Springs to St. Petersburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Brooksville, Inverness, Dade City, Bushnell, Downtown Saint Petersburg, Hudson, Holiday, Homosassa Springs, Saint Petersburg, Lutz, and Brandon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EST for central and west central Florida.
